text:
Menginap di sini 4 hari 3 malam, sya merekomendasikan hotel ini enak untuk liburan tapi tidak untuk business trip, karena kamarnya cenderung gelap dengan lampu berwarna kuning, jadi agak kesulitas ketika harus bekerja malam hari dikamar. 

Lokasi hotel enak, karena langsung sebelah pantai, pantainya besih dan bisa dipakai bermain. kolam renang juga cukup bersih namun tidak terlalu besar.
Kamar hotel Langsung menghadap ke pantai, ada balkon yang bisa dibuka,  jadi bisa langsung menikmati angin laut,, tapi malam malam gelap sekali...
Kondisi kamar bersih, kamar mandi juga bersih, air anas juga ada hanya saja showernya terlalu kecil,, 
Kasurnya nyaman dan hanya cukup untuk 2 orang (sepertinya ukurannya queen) , tapi bantalnya keras sehinnga buat saya kurang nyaman, jadi cukup bikin sakit kepala untuk tidur,, mungkin sebaiknya hotelnya ganti bantal yang lebih nyaman. 

Sarapan beberapa hari di hotel cukup baik, makanannya juga enak.. sempat room service juga makanannya enak, tapi di hari terakhir saya room service menunggu makakannya ada 2 jam lebih, alasannya karena lagi ada acara, ntah bagaimana time management dapurnya.. 
dihari terakhir saya harus check out jam 5 WITA, dan mereka bersedia menyiapkan bekalan untuk sarapan dibawa (dengan catatan konfirmasi dimalam hari) 

Pelayanannya semua staffnya sangat membantu dan ramah,  bahkan cepat tanggap. 

Terimakasih Sotis Hotel
title: Not recomended for Business Trip, but Recomended for Holiday

text: Kesan pertama masuk ke hotel Sotis Kupang yaitu rapi dan ramah terhadap tamu yang datang. Setelah masuk dan pesan ke resepsionis, pelayanannya cukup ramah dan cepat. Untuk pemesanan hotel pembayaranya bisa menggunakan DP terlebih dahulu dengan diberikan kuitansi jumlah DP yang nanti akan diambil ketika kita mau melunasi/check out. Di hotel ini juga menyediakan wifi. Untuk kamar, cukup simple dan bersih. Layanan baik dan cepat. AC cukup dingi, Tvnya belum digital. Lampu semuanya nyala tidak ada masalah. Lokasi hotel sangat baik karena berada tepat di depan Pantai. Secara keseluruhan hotel ini sangat direkomendasikan untuk menginap baik itu tujuan bisnis ataupun liburan. Sekian :)

text:
Kamar bagus dan nyaman, amenities lengkap, hanya saja beberapa perabotan seperti lampu tidur tidak mau menyala dan electricity sepertinya mengalami gangguan di kamar saya 421, tapi tidak mengurangi kenyamanan untuk beristrahat.

Makanan breakfast yang sangat enak dan pelayanan yang cukup baik menurut saya.

Kurang berkenan di hati hanya ketika acara rapat kami di Aula Kolbano terganggu oleh sound system yang hidup mati berulang kali selama kurang lebih satu jam, dapat teratasi namun kesannya lambat karena setelah satu jam mengalami gangguan baru teratasi.

Saran bagi tamu yang stay di kamar yang menghadap laut, jangan terlalu lama membuka pintu balkon karena akan ada serangga yang masuk ke kamar dari arah pantai.

text: Aku sudah berapa kali nginap di sotis hotel kupang. Semua staff nya ramah, disapa teruslah kalau kemana-mana 😄. Kamarnya bersih, dingin,  ventilasi buat cahaya matahari  juga ada.  Apalagi kamar dengan view laut,  waahh itu indah banget sih, bisa sambil liat sunset. Mau ke bawah buat ke restonya juga gampang banget, bisa nongkrong di area kolamnya, resto beer and barelnya, atau di pinggiran laut juga bisa.  Enak banget deh nginap disini. Breakfastnya enak-enak, ada banyak pilihan juga, makanan-makannya juga enak.   Hehe, bahas makan melulu jadinya yah. Yang paling seru lagi kalau malam bisa diner sambil dengerin live music.  Liburannya berasa banget lah.  Aku suka nginap di hotel sotis kupang. Teman-teman yang cari hotel dengan view laut di area kupang ke sotis kupang aja.  Hehe 😄😍

Sebenarnya ada beberapa pertimbangan untuk hotel saat kita mau memilih hotel untuk menginap dan biasanya ada sesi foto, dari fotografer kami memberikan saran lebih baik di sotis, jadi kami coba untuk mencari alasan kenapa harus di sotis,

mulai membandingkan dengan hotel yang lain sama2 ada view pantai, ada kolamnya ada barnya, harganya juga mirip2

tapi akhirnya kami memutuskan sotis saja, dan alhasil memang ternyata itu pilihan yang tepat.. :D

Anda dapat menggunakan semua fasilitas yang ada untuk foto dll bagi yg wedding, gratis tanpa perlu biaya tambahan.. dan sepertinya mereka sudah terbiasa untuk itu.. sebab banyak juga couple2 yang akan menikah menggunakan hotel sotis juga sebagai hotel mereka.. :D

btw, hanya note kecil untuk yg banyak uang tapi note besar untuk yg pas2an
agak aneh untuk pemesanan secara langsung, sepertinya lebih murah pesan online daripada pesan secara langsung

saat kami perpanjang untuk kamar yg sama harganya saat bayar langsung dari 300rb / malam kami booking online dan perpanjang secara langsung tanpa online menjadi 400rb wow, tanpa alasan yang pasti, katanya harganya memang segitu itupun sudah di diskon.. (menurut mereka)

itulah sebabnya agak aneh :D
mungkin inconsistency dengan harga yg tertera di online2 booking.

btw, sebelum di salah artikan, kami booking online tanpa diskon, dan harganya sekitar 300rb-an tidak sampai 400rb

title: Bimtek fasilitator daerah dapodik provinsi Nusa tenggara timur

owner_response.text:
Dear LPMP NTT,

Salam Hangat dari Sotis Hotel Kupang,

text:
Tepatnya tanggal 18 sore saya check in di hotel sotis Kupang bersama keluarga. Kami mengambil 2 kamar yaitu 208 dan 220. Pertama kali masuk kamar, saya menyadari ada yang aneh karena tanpa saya masukkan magnetic card ke tempatnya, lampu kamar ini sudah menyala. Ternyata tempat magnetic card di kamar tidak berfungsi.
Tanggal 19 pagi, sayapun mengalami kejadian tidak mengenakkan. Sekedar info, ini bukan pertama kalinya saya menginap bersama keluarga di hotel sotis kupang. Seperti biasa, pagi hari saya bersama keluarga menuju resto untuk breakfast. Prosesnya berjalan normal. Ketika hendak masuk, saya ditanya sekuriti, “Dari kamar berapa Pak”. Dan kemudian kami masuk. Beberapa saat kemudian, istri saya maw mengambil makanan namun dicegat sekuriti dengan perkataan, “Maaf bu... Untuk anaknya dikenakan cas karena breakfast hanya untuk 2 orang. (Anak saya berumur 6 tahun dan 2 tahun).” Istri saya kaget karena bukan pertama kalinya kami menginap di Sotis dan lebih parahnya, kenapa informasi sepenting ini tidak diinfokan waktu check in atau sebelum masuk resto untuk breakfast. Berselang beberapa saat, ada staff sotis datang dan berkata, “ow tidak apa2 bu, aturan cas itu hanya dikenakan untuk anak usia di atas 10 tahun, jadi silahkan dilanjutkan makannya...”
Hal ini membuat mood makan kami menjadi hilang. Puncaknya besok pagi yaitu tanggal 20 pagi ketika hendak breakfast, kami dicegat dengan alasan yang sama.
Akhirnya, saya pun berinisiatif menanyakan info yang benar terkait masalah tersebut kepada resepsionis namun sampai saya check out, tidak ada konfirmasi balik dari resepsionis...
Sangat mengecewakan....
Mohon pihak manajemen memberikan info yang tepat untuk semua karyawan agar tidak ada yang misinformasi...
Terima kasih...
title: Service is the most important thing

owner_response.text:
Dear Valuables Guest,

Terima kasih Atas kepercayaan Bapak dan keluarga terhadap Sotis Hotel Kupang,

Kami sangat senang mengetahui bahwa Bapak dan keluarga selalu menyempatkan waktu untuk menginap di hotel kami.

Mohon Maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi pada tanggal 19 Agustus 2020. 

Perlu Kami informasikan kembali bahwa aturan Sarapan Pagi yang berlaku di Sotis Hotel Kupang adalah 2 Pax sarapan untuk dewasa dan free 1 pax untuk anak - anak dengan usia 1 - 5 tahun. Apabila anak Bapak dan Ibu berusia diatas 5 Tahun akan kami kenakan charge seharga paket Sarapan Pagi Dewasa.

Atas nama manajemen kami sampaikan permohonan maaf yang mendalam, terkait belum ada tanggapan ataupun informasi yang diberikan resepsionis kami saat melakukan proses check in dan check out. Kami telah melakukan training kembali terkait mekanisme check  in dan check out agar perihal yang Bapak dan Ibu alami tidak terjadi lagi dikemudian hari.

Terima kasih atas kepedulian Bapak dan Keluarga terhadap pelayanan hotel Kami.
Kami sangat berharap dapat kembali menjamu bapak dan keluarga di Sotis Hotel Kupang dengan pelayanan terbaik kami di kemudian hari.

Salam Hangat,
Manajemen

text:
Kami memilih hotel ini karena terletak di tepi Pantai Pasir Panjang, memiliki akses langsung ke pantai dari hotel. Pantai cukup bersih walaupun di batu karang dekat laut terdapat banyak lumut sehingga harus hati-hati karena cukup licin.

Menginap dengan suami selama 3 malam di hotel ini, memilih kamar deluxe double. Kamar tipe ini cukup luas dan bersih, terdapat 1 sofa, kamar tidak langsung menghadap pantai, tapi bisa menengok sedikit ke arah laut.
Kamar mandi cukup ok namun tidak terlalu luas. Saat kami menginap di sana aliran shower air panas tidak lancar (air panas hanya mengalir sebentar saat keran "hot water" dibuka, setelah beberapa menit air tidak terasa hangat lagi).
Untuk breakfast, rasa makanan cukup ok, namun menurut saya kurang bervariasi dibandingkan Aston Kupang.

Kolam renang tidak begitu luas, namun memiliki pemandangan ke pantai & laut.
Parkir kendaraan di basement, setiap kami ingin memarkirkan mobil, tidak ada petugas yang membantu mengarahkan saat ingin parkir mobil; begitu pun saat mobil mau keluar ke jalan raya, tidak ada petugas yang membantu memberhentikan kendaraan lain yang melaju di jalan raya.

owner_response.text:

Early check in tidak bisa alasan belum siap padahal sdh jam 12.30 siang...alesannya tamu check out pas2an semua jam 12..minta print bukti check out, ngak berani,...3.duty manager bahkan sekelas GM nya datang juga tidak solved problem bahkan cenderung bela anak buah, tamu yg diajak debat 4.sarapan pagi rasanya standart dan tdk variatif, menginap 3 hari ya tdk banyak berubah 5. Kelebihannya : 1. Lokasinya bagus, persis di pantai .....2. Beberapa staff sopan santunnya luar biasa bagus, melebihi duty manager sekelas GM nya .....3.kebersihan juga bagus overall....

Pengalaman pertama ke kota Kupang....semoga kedepan lebih baik lagi....kalau sdh dapat bintang 4, dijaga jangan jadi rasa bintang 3, walaupun secara harga termasuk reasonable bahkan murah dibanding hotel bintang 4 lainnya, namun jangan korbankan kualitas.....semoga.....
title: Hotel bintang 4 rasa bintang 3

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak Darmady T.

Salam Hangat dari Sotis Hotel Kupang,

Mengenai keluhan Bapak sesuai dengan standard hotel kami pemberian kunci kamar minimal 2 kunci kamar namun terkait dengan perihal ini, Kamar yang sudah diblocking untuk keluarga Bapak satu kuncinya sudah kami masukan ke keytag dengan tujuan agar kamar Bapak lebih sejuk ketika Bapak masuk ke kamar (sudah dijelaskan ketika bapak melakukan check in)

Kedua, Early check in saat itu belum bisa kami berikan dikarenakan hari sebelumnya occupancy kamar kami sedang penuh dan jam check out tamu di jam 12, Setelahnya kamar harus kami bersihkan dan disiapkan lagi untuk tamu berikutnya dan print bukti check out tamu merupakan rahasia perusahaan. Sebelumnya Bookingan untuk kamar tersebut tidak ada informasi untuk Early check in. Jika ada informasi pihak kami akan menyediakan kamar sesuai dengan permintaan.Dari Pihak hotel sudah mencoba menjelaskan terkait hal tersebut diatas tapi bapak merasa bahwa GM membela karyawannya. 

Untuk menu sarapan kami sudah melakukan improvement yang terbaik, perlu kami informasikan bahwa sarapan kami setiap hari selalu variatif dan Mengenai ruangan Lobby tidak pernah terlihat dan terasa ada nyamuk karena kami seruing melakukan penyemprotan "pest control". 

Demikian Penjelasan kami, Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyaman yang Bapak Rasakan, semua masukan yang Bapak berikan saat ini kami sudah melakukan improvement yang terbaik bagi tamu- tamu kami yang lainnya.

Kami harapkan kunjungan bapak kembali di Sotis hotel Kupang,

Terima Kasih
Management Sotis Hotel Kupang

text: Saya sangat menikmati menginap di Sotis Luxury Hotel Kupang karena lokasinya di pinggir pantai dengan pemandangan yang indah. Kamar yang saya tempati pun tipe sea view dengan balkon membuat saya betah duduk berlama-lama memandangi laut dan langit biru di pagi maupun sore hari. Hotel ini memiliki 2 kolam renang, yang satu menghadap pantai langsung dengan bangku-bangku pinggir kolam untuk menikmati udara sembari menunggu matahari terbenam. Kalau ingin melihat warga sekitar menghabiskan waktu di saat sunset, tinggal turun ke pantai dan berjalan-jalan menyusurinya. Atau di saat enggan berolahraga di bawah terik matahari, saya hanya perlu pakai treadmill dengan suguhan pemandangan laut. Ruang makan juga menyediakan area outdoor menghadap pantai. Lobi hotel sangat nyaman karena luas dan banyak bangku-bangku empuk. Secara umum, saya puas sekali menginap di hotel ini. Sangat relaxing.

text: Last night Claudia and I stayed at the Sotis Hotel Kupang. It is rated 4 star, and when I booked it the reviews on booking. Com were very high. I now understand. The hotel is clean, well located and very comfortable. However, the customer service we experienced was exceptional. A good example was Henokh, (I hope I got the spelling right!)...a talented friendly employee who was extremely polite, cooperative and ‘nothing was too much trouble’. In fact all the staff we interacted with were similar... there is a very good energy in this hotel. The only issue for us was the difficulty in getting a glass of wine... a usual challenge in Indonesia...however,  definitely recommend this hotel...should be rated 4.5 star, but has 5 star service.
title: John Robinson

text:
We ended up staying five nights in this clean, modern and friendly hotel. The pool, located right next to the beach is great for a a sunset swim. All was well until we had to switch rooms (we had a beachside room with balcony) due to a group booking. Our new room had a knocking noise, which persisted throughout our stay. We rang reception three times, each time they promised someone would come up, but didn’t. Finally someone came up to investigate and it turns out it was a known problem, the water pump. They said they would switch it off, which they did, but then the noise returned in the middle of the night. This meant we had no sleep for most of the night due to the thud, thud, thud. If we had been told the room we were staying in had a noise problem we would have stayed elsewhere.
Will stay again but not in room 502
title: Great beachside rooms but avoid room 502

text: This could be a very nice place with some decent management of staff. There is no room service menu in the rooms. If you ask for a menu, they tell you to either visit the restaurant, or they will bring you the menu to read and place an order, or they Will  attempt to read the menu to you over the phone. They will adk that you speak Indonesian if they don't like or agree with what you are requesting and will vow and declare that the desserts are not on the menu after a particular time (2200 at one time and 2100 at another) They are simply being lazy as getting dessert apparently rewuires extra effort. We found that going to the B&B coffee shop and asking for dessert actually got results, proving that you can get dessert at 2200. If you want a hair dryer or extra blanket, you have to sign that you received it, the voucher shows the cost if the item is not returned. You also have to request these items several times. House keeping sometimes do not replenish toilet paper, or forget to replace towels. The staff in the restaurant need to be more attentive, for want of a better description they are very lazy. The view is nice, although the beach could be tidied up.
title: So so

text:
The seaview rooms are OK, have a small balcony. Bathroom OK, but just two towls for two people provided is rather poor, although one can request more. Rooms are clean, beds are ok. TV channels 20, but not one international news channel, which one might expect. Breakfast for one who likes bread instead of rice is poor, only white bread available. A nuisance are the flies in the dining room. Dinner enough choice, great local steaks, very tender, maybe I was lucky... Staf very friendly and forthcoming. Value for money. By the way, the beach is hopelesly dirty... Even in front of the hotel, it is not cleaned, full of driftwood, plastic and garbage..  
In general probably the best hotel in West Timor.
Internet is slow, forget any streaming, but using e-mail should be no problem.
Airport transportation against a fee, about usd 6 one way, is OK
title: Good hotel for the price

text: Firstly the positive - the junior staff (from reception to restaurant to drivers) were all excellent, friendly and helpful.  The room was fine except for a bizarre system with the lighting that meant that there was always a bright light on even at night; apparently the only way to stop it was to pull out the room card key and that would cut all electricity, including the aircon. I ended up having to sleep in an eye mask.  I say 'sleep' because the music from the bar was so loud at my end of the hotel until 2am that I had to use ear-plugs.  On my final night they then decided to have a full sound-check for a music event the following night - from 2am until 3am it was impossible to sleep even with earplugs since it was so loud up and the bass caused the whole room to shake.  I made three calls to complain and finally it stopped and I was told the manager would see me in the morning to hear my complaint.  It never happened.  I would have moved out if I had not been anyway due to leave the next day.  My advice would be to stay somewhere else to sleep (so long as it is a few hundred meters away!) but go to enjoy the good food and bar at the Sotis.
title: Great staff, but no sleep possible....

Sotis was better than I expected and was very good value for money. 
Check in was rather slow and I was surprised to hear that my room was not ready when I arrived at 10pm and had to wait for 15 minutes. 
Buffet breakfast included but a bit sparse and not surprising given the low occupancy but decent enough. 
If you want to spoil yourself then go for an ocean view room and watch the magnificent sunsets.

text:
I've stayed in Sotis 4 times, and this hotel is always becoming my 1st option now. 
I've stayed in 3 different hotels before, and i can say that this hotel has pretty much everything you need no matter you come here for a holiday or bussiness trip. 
The hotel is about 20-30 minutes from the airport, no biggie because there's no traffic in Kupang.

The best thing though, i think this is the only hotel in Kupang which has direct access to Pasir Panjang beach. 
The beach itself is not the best one in East Nusa Tenggara islands, but its really more than enough to refresh your mind and eyes, particularly if you are coming from a hectic city with no fresh air, beautiful blue sky, and stars at night. 

Swimming pool is only open until 6PM, so no night swimming, but thats fine because they also have nice bar inside the hotel.

Food is more than average. 
The staff are all very warm, nice, and helpful.
The hotel has its own restaurant/bar/cafe and has a nice band every night. 

8 out of 10! 
(well...8,5) 

Cheers,
title: Best hotel in Kupang

text:
We chose this hotel for the “beach front” access for our 3D2N stay. Yes, you can access the beach easily from the hotel but the beach is littered with plastic bottles. I agree that the hotel is most likely not the culprit but some form of clean would be good. 
Good steady wifi. 
The staff are friendly however we did encounter one staff that was friendly but not necessarily helpful when we were seeking some information about the surrounding area. Either the staff is unfamiliar, or it was beyond her job scope. Anyways, we managed to find out the information we needed from our Grab driver. 
We informed the front desk that the AC in our room was not cold. A technician was sent but it was still not good. Since we’d already unpacked, we couldn’t be bothered to ask for a room change. No one checked on us whether it was better or if we needed a room change either. 
I would stay at another hotel if I came back to Kupang.
title: Beach Access with a Twist

text:
We stayed in Kupang for a night before and after travelling to Rote Island. This trip the Sotis was my preferred option even though it was more expensive. To get a sea view in both we had to book a twin room. 

The rooms at the Sotis are lovely. The bed had the towels in the shape of an elephant so I immediately noted that some effort had gone into making sure guests were happy. I couldn’t fault the cleanliness. Strange to have a window into the bathroom from the bedroom but I note this is often the case in Indonesia and there was a blind for privacy if you need it. Perhaps designed to provide natural light into the bathroom. The beds were comfy and sheets were crisp white. The room was a good size and I loved the little balcony. The only suggestion I could offer is to keep the music turned lower in the restaurant area so we can talk not yell. No problem with loud music in the bar and outside, just good to have an option. I’ve got a couple of other hotels that I want to try in Kupang but so far Sotis gets the big tick.
title: Great room - lovely little balcony!

text:
This was my second time staying at sotis hotel kupang and it always brings such a great experience. The room view is directly to the sea and in the morning the sun rise will brighten the day before starting the activity. 

2 weeks staying in this hotel (premiere type) and still feel comfortable and never get bored of the atmosphere of the room and the outside view from the balcony.

It was so relaxing to stay in the room after a long day outside.

I was used to opening the room balcony door even in the night to feel the natural air and wind from the sea entering the room.
It felt So enjoyable.

Beside the stunning room facilities, the breakfast is also very tasty and varied. The restaurant is so well designed with its perfect view to the pool and sea. 
I really did enjoy my breakfast with its relaxing view combined with the fresh air touching the skin.

Its service from the receptionists and other staffs are also excellent, so kind and helpful.

I like this hotel live music and the swimming pool as well. 
we can swim while enjoying the sea view at the same time. So perfect and i am in love with this hotel.

Will stay at this hotel again and again.
title:
Captivating and enchanting experience staying 
 at hotel sotis kupang

text:
The Room is clean and spacious , but the desk is way too small for me to work with...

The View is Amazing , looking at the beach from balcony is memorable
you can access the beach from the hotel pool...

The Crew and Service , Polite , Excellent and Helpful , they even go over the top on closing hours in order to provide meal for my family, 

The Breakfast are average in terms of variation, but the egg station are Excellent , small details that they seasoned the eggs very well , best ommelete i've ever tasted...

There is a restaurant next to the hotel that you can order from your room , its a lil bit pricey but the food are Delicious , ive tried Oxtail Soup, Chicken and Tenderloin Steak , Capcay (rice and vegetable with seared chicken on top), fried rice, chicken wings and strawberry and vanilla milkshake (Love it)

The Bathroom , nothing special there but its clean nice and tidy...

Overall , i would rate sotis as solid 8 / 10

It is by far my number one option for Vacation, definietly will comeback.. in fact if it wasnt because the hotel fully booked , we would extend the room for another night..
title: Experience of first time sotis hotel

text:
My first time to stay here as well as the first time to visit Kupang, and it was SUPERB! Not only the facility that is more than sufficient for me, but also the direct beach view with super soft white sand which was STUNNING! 

The people here will make you feel welcomed with the warmth of East Nusa Tenggara, couldn't be happier with the service. Morids(Morits?) was very helpful and informative, Ayu with her nice coffee (can I have one more cup?), and Satria who was willing to catch the feedback from the guest. Also Mr.Herman the Head of HR who was so welcomed and hospitable, you nailed it Sir in becoming the role model for your crew. 

Despite of the facility matters (tab cover) which was so understandable due to the pandemic matters, there is no bad thing I can say about this accommodation. Already becoming my love at first sight and I will definitely go back with my bunch of mates while returning to Kupang. Keep up with the good work Sotis crew, happy to repeat my stay in the future!
title: Love at First Sight!

owner_response.text:
Dear Kottays
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.
We understand your comments and allow us to apologize for the inconvenience.

Based on the relevant travel agency's policy, the room you have booked cannot be cancelled.
According to the information that has been included by the travel agent on the website or in the application when you first select and book a room.

If there are comments and other suggestions that you want to convey, you can directly contact the Service department at fom.kupang@sotishotels.com.

Once again we apologize for the inconvenience and we sincerely hope to have the opportunity to return to make your experience even better.

Best Regards

Sotis Management

text: Staff were great(especially Moris 👍🏾), bfast was good, room was also comfortable. I would recommend people to come here. However, not during the weekends(especially saturday night), and this is my biggest disappointment. The bar next door(that is connected and owned by the hotel) has a DJ party that goes until 4am! I cant believe it. The noise was super loud and the guests are forced to not have a good sleep. If it was only until 10 or 11pm, thats fine. But 4am?! I mean common, no consideration for the guest that wants to rest. After all, its a hotel where people relax, not a club. So please have that weekly bar event reviewed! U are running a hotel business, not a club. I hope sotis will really change this asap as i saw many comments(even from 2 years ago!) about this particular problem. Please respect the guest, thank you. Other than that, everything was great. Would give a 5 star..but bcos of the music, i just cant. Thanks.
title: Overall it was great! But with one big dissapointment.

My friend and I really enjoyed the beauty of this hotel. Large and clean rooms, beautiful sea views, and friendly service. It is a very good idea to spend a weekend at this place. Your morning is fresh, your afternoon is cheerful and your night is calm.

If you bring a vehicle, there is a basement room to store your vehicle for free, the pool is very clean and child friendly, I will come again with my family after this.
Highly recommend to stay here on weekend

text:
The room was exquisite, good color composition and furniture placement, clean, good air circulation, and not to mention the amazing sea view. Working remotely from this room really amazed me, never felt that relaxed and comfortable before for remote working.

The live music or DJ at night really completed every delicious dinner I had there, the steak and tomyum soup were amazing, perfect seasoning and plating for the steak, and really strong and fresh seafood tomyum soup.

The service was also very excellent, really kind, fun, humble and helpful employees. Worth to mention was they helped me a lot for the antigen test.
title: One Week in Sotis Hotel Kupang (Vacation and Remote Working)

text:
The best beach view hotel in Kupang.
Sotis hotel, 4stars hotel, located in the center of Kupang city. If you looking for family hotel, you can choose this hotel. There are swimming pool, gym, spa, buffet breakfast. Besides the hotel, there is a bar, named beer and barels, you can have lunch or dinner there.
This hotel is good in health protocol. All the staffs wear mask everytime. They also provide some hand sanitizer, but not at every floor near elevator.
Swimming pool is quite big enough at Kupang city. On the other hand, you need to ask the swimming pool's towel and have to be waited long enough.
Breakfast buffet was good. They served a lot choices from local to western food.
We stayed at executive suites. The room was cozy, nicely maintained. There is a bathtub inside the room. Some of faucet need to be placed, so do the drains in bathroom.
Overall, we enjoyed our stay in Sotis Kupang and will be back soon.. Thank you sotis kupang for your hospitality.
title: Best Hotel in Kupang

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I was invited to the hotel to Dj at beer and barrel. When I arrived in kupang, the manager was there to actually meet me along with the driver. He is super friendly and his English is impeccable. As we drove back to the hotel he was like a mini tour guide giving me all sorts of fun and interesting facts about the island. 

When I arrived at the hotel, all the COVID protocols were in place so I felt safe without feeling like they were overbearing.  The hotel lobby is as beautiful as any other 5 star hotel that I had been in. Everyone is super friendly. Check in was super fast and easy. I got to my room which had an ocean view. The beach is gorgeous and the water is crystal clear. The food that I ordered, soup buntut, sate and nasi goreng were amazing. The sambal merah that came was homemade and some of the best sambal I’ve had. 

I used the fitness facilities while I was there. It was empty and clean which I loved. It had just the right about of equipment for me to be able to get in my full workout without having to get creative. 

Beer and barrel is the nightclub attached to the hotel. It’s epic. It has a pool, is open air and is ocean front. The sound system is amazing and the space is huge so I didn’t feel claustrophobic. The people were so friendly and so happy. I had such a great experience. When I finished playing, I was escorted by security out of the club which was awesome and they took me all the way to my room to make sure I got in safely. 

The following morning I got a wake up call without even ordering it and had a driver ready to take me back to the airport. 

All the staff were friendly and professional. I will definitely return to stay for a vacation and I will definitely want to vacation in kupang. It’s a gorgeous place.
title: Perfect experience

text:
This is a good hotel and given a bit of time will be a great hotel.
The new management is working hard to lift the standard of this hotel.
At present the hotel is very good with a few small problems (such as overflowing shower drains and some poor housekeeping) but these are quickly being rectified.
I would certainly return and use again as I know every day it is better than before.
The hotel is in a great location and the facilities are great.
Nice live or DJ music in connecting resto
Another BIG plus is the hotel's concern for the environment and thus seeks to clean up the beach out front regularly and use water well
Worth a try

text: This used to be my favorite hotel in Kupang: seated by the beach, with a balcony in the room, it provided a perfect view of the sea during sunrise. However, my recent stay showed how the hotel has deteriorated. The door didn't close well, the breakfast option was bad, and the rooms are not soundproof and you can hear almost too well what is happening at the next room. I was put in a room with connecting door, and there is only one connecting door and I could see the light from the other room (and all the noises that come with it). As other reviews mentioned too, the noises from the bar next door are too loud; not the best hotel to have a rest. Unfortunately, I had a thoroughly unpleasant stay. On the upside, the staff is friendly and helpful, but not as professional as other hotel such as Aston.
title: You can hear whatever is happening in the next room; not a good hotel to have a rest in

text:
The pool and proximity to beach is very nice.  The breakfast spread and restaurant are both mediocre.  The customer service is seriously lacking.  Serious mistakes with food orders, the spa and recommend you don't get a room facing the pool on the weekend as they have very loud events on Saturdays and Sundays that are clearly heard in the room.  

Also be careful of the hotel supported drivers from the advertisement in the lobby.  We hired a driver for a half day (6 hours) to drive to Tablolong beach and Crystal cave for 600 Rupiah, as advertised.  When we returned to the hotel the driver tried to over-charge us an extra 300 Rupiah for 'leaving the city' and the lobby staff behind the check-in counter supported the driver.  We explained to the staff that the price (as advertised) and places we visited were agreed upon that morning before we left with no mention of an extra fee for leaving the city and after seeing that we were obviously upset they apologized and we only paid 600 Rupiah.  

It was very unnerving that they didn't side with the customer immediately in this situation and took a bit of argument to get the agreed upon price.

Having stayed at the Aston down the street as well, I would recommend staying there over the Sotis.
title: Decent hotel lacking in Customer Service

text:
Rooms were very good, view spectacular but that's about where it ends!
Booked in paid and then staff pointed toward the lift, your rooms that way!
Organised a six hour hire car with driver to show us around Kupang, driver could not speak nor understand English and I don't know Indonesian Bahsa. A letter was slipped under our room wilst we were out saying that there would be a party tonight starting at 9 PM and finishing when they finish (no time given) and they may be loud music...yes thumping loooooooud music until 0400 in the morning. People next to us weer running up and down the hallway and laughing and yelling to their friends in their room, doors were slamming and talking /yelling in the hallways, this continued until 0400 also, at which time i called the reception and they said they would send someone up...15 minutes  later ....room service???. 
Went to have dinner at the bar in the hotel at approx 6 Pm...waited 15 minutes at bar..no service, went to reception and they said they would call someone, waited another 10-15 minutes and then gave up. Tries getting lunch the next day got the service then told that we could not sit at the bar but had to sit either outside in the heat or go to the restaurant to get served??? we went to the restaurant i ordered calamari, it came out it was tougher then rubber and cold! i bounced it off the table to show the staff how bad it was.there were a number of other instances that were terrible but i ended up going to reception to make a complaint and asked for a manger " oh sorry we don't have a manger" please write your complaint here ...on a business card sized piece of paper. I ended up writing an email. This was acknowledged the next day by a staff member. they asked if i wanted free dinner...no thanks! I was told that i knew that there would be a loud noisy party ( I didn't know at the time of booking or checking in otherwise i would not have booked in there and I told them this) I was also told that the check in on the staffs checklist was completed in other word pretty much telling me that the check in was done correctly and that I was lying.. 
I think you've got the point
Customer service was terrible to non existent, i definitely would not recommend a stay at this overpriced 4 star hotel
title: Great view form room that's it!

The Bellboy guys both of them when I arrived and left the hotel is really attentive and super helpful... I remember one guy name is Chris and I forgot the others... 

But if you want the nice beachfront view, please ask them the higher floors, coz, 3rd Floor, still cant see too much..
title: Good Service Beach Front View

text:
I upgraded my room so that I had a balcony and it was 100% worth it, amazing view of sunset. Pool facilities were good, modern comfortable rooms, staff were helpful and friendly (especially in reception area) and breakfast was excellent. 

If you are a solo female traveller, I would recommend this hotel as it is on the beach. Unfortunately, I found I couldn’t go to any other beach in Kupang as I was harassed constantly as soon as I left the hotel; therefore having a beach outside of the hotel was great.
title: Excellent hotel

text: After travelling for 2 months through Lombok, Sumbawa and Flores, we yearned for some creature comforts and Sotis Hotel provided exactly that.  We had the Premium room, which was spacious, clean, functional and outfitted with all the amenities we could ask for.  The WiFi was strong, AC quiet, and the LED TV modern.  The view from the private balcony overlooking the sea was perfect, especially at sunset.  The staff was super friendly and always welcoming.  We enjoyed our stay so much that after visiting traditional villages around Soe and Kefa, we returned to the Sotis Hotel before hitting the trail again.  Very much recommend the Sotis Hotel.
title: Best Hotel in Kupang

I really love the new hotel. If you want a hotel with view, this is the best choice. Their lobby is larger than the other famous hotel in Kupang.

The food taste good. They give plenty of choices (for a 4 star hotel in small capital city it was more than enough) for breakfast and have a cafe there with good food too.

I'm sure will be back here if I have to stay in kupang rather than A**** which is too crowded. Keep the good work.

text:
We stayed here for 4 nights. From 15th August 2017 until 19th August 2017. 

The first time we arrived at the hotel, the atmosphere of the lobby and the staff are great. The hotel really has a great standard. We were given the room as we ordered which is "premier king" type and turned out the room had a sea view 👍👍

The first hour we stayed, the Air Con did not work well. We called the front desk and they moved us to the next room. The staff was very fast in handling our complain and the result was great. 

The room service also had great quality of foods. It was delicious. Really great service we got there.

The breakfast buffet had various items. From bread (white, wholemeal, traditional indonesian cake, baguette, mini doughnuts and brownies), fresh salads, fruits, soups, rice, noodles, egg station, waffle station, dimsum, cereals and drinks. But 1 thing I personally adore, is their breaded fish with tar-tar sauce. It was awesome!

Can not wait to my next visit!! Would recommend this hotel to my friends and relatives
title: Simply the best hotel in town

text:
We spend one night before we heading back to our normal life at Sotis hotel, which have perfect location that really close to down town and airport. with a bay view behind the hotel make you can catch prefect the sunset every single day.
The hotel is brand new, with a 5 star services and 3 star prices makes you promise to come back and stay again. Friendly front office and team is the key for them to give us comfort zone since the first time you step in to the hotel. Nice standard room with good TV channel and perfect Air Conditioner is a terms and condition to get lazy due weather in East Indonesia a bit hot compare to other places. You can enjoy your night at caffe beside the hotel which provide live music and bar and pool table. and laying down in lazy chair near the swimming pool. thats means PERFECT!!
in the morning we surprise with so many thing to eat at breakfast room ^^ so many food you can try without afraid getting sick due their kitchen is so clean and hygienic. The price we spend is equal for what we get, lower prices with great services. 
The next day my self start a new trip to Labuan Bajo, you can fly with Garuda Indonesia, daily flight from El-Tari to Labuan Bajo with one stop around 15 minutes in Ende's city. Enjoy your life, Yukita Go and Yukita Travel!!
title: 20160912 Sotis Hotel with best services, resto, breakfast, caffe, live music, pool table

text:
My family and i were here during ied holiday, i like every thing about the hotel, it catch every sense. The design, the atmosphere, the smell, the people, every thing. Here's the summary of our visit:

1. Checkin process is fast, but unfortunately the FO giving us a room that still in make up process. The HK staff is surprise when she found out that FO giving the room. I have to go to lobby again and finally the moved us to another room.   

2. We have a dinner in the hotel restaurant called "Beer & Barrel". The waiter is very friendly (unfortunately i forget his name). The order take very long to come, although there only 4 -5 table filled with other dinner guest. We have to wait for 30 - 45 minutes before our order finally arrive. Latter we learn that only 2 kitchen staff available that night. 
We  order 3 kind of food: soft crab sushi, their signature dish fried sei kwetiaw, and Hainan rice for my children. Soft crab sushi is nice, sei kwetiaw is too salty, and hainan rice is tasteless. My wife also order fresh strawberry juice for her drink, but it turn out that the juice is made with strawberry syrup with a small portion of fresh strawberries. Need improvement in this area.

3. The following morning we had a break fast in the same restaurant again, and seated in outdoor area near pool. When i seated i notice a stinky smell, and guess what....there a poo in the patio (i notice that some cat is playing around the outdoor area, but the poo is "to big" for a cat poo, so human poo perhaps? 😅😅) I notify the manager in charge and we relocated in other table. 

4. Apart of all of the incident, we like the hotel, compare to other hotel in kupang, its a great hotel, and theres room for improvement specially in restaurant area. (Service & cleanliness).

And oh...... the oreo cheese cake is delicious, i love it.

Regards
Bondan Prawira
title: Great Hotel & still room for improvement

text: C'est la bonne surprise de Kupang. De prime abord je suis surpris par la décoration du hall, colorée, improbable, kitch même. La réceptionniste parle peu Anglais. Heureusement le bellboy vient à sa rescousse. C'est un personnage sorti tout droit d'une sitcom. Drôle, sympathique, prêt à tout pour vous rendre service. J'ai une chambre basique au 3 eme étage. Il y a tout sous la main, mais le génie créatif des designer s'est arrêté aux parties communes. La literie est correcte sans plus. La penderie est vraiment petite. Pour le reste il y a tout sous la main. La salle de bain est vraiment petite mais bien équipée. Comme nous sommes en période de Ramadan, il y a un service de petit dej de 03:00 à 04:30. J'aime beaucoup l’ambiance et les buffets orientés cuisine Indonésiennes. A noter que le poulet est très bon. La piscine longe la plage et est très sympa. Malheureusement l'endroit est un peu délaissé et le système de circulation de l'eau me parait à l'arrêt. Il faut chercher les serviettes. Pourtant l'endroit possède tous les atouts pour être un must avec ses arbres et la vue sur la mer. Ce qui pourrait faire la différence, c'est la plage devant L’Hôtel. La mer est belle avec des pêcheurs pas très loin. Il suffirait juste tous les matins pendant une heure de faire un tour avec un sac poubelle pour nettoyer la plage et en quelques jours vous avez un must. J'ai beaucoup aimé séjourner dans cet hôtel que je conseille vivement.
title: beaucoup de potentiel, mais nettoyez la plage

text:
Wir haben das Hotel Sotis für 4 Nächte gebucht. leider waren wir absolut nicht glücklich in diesem Hotel. das Restaurant und das Frühstück im Hotel waren einfach und schlicht und zumutbar. Nichts klappte absolut nichts.bei der Ankunft im Hotel haben wir festgestellt obwohl wir ein Luxus Zimmer bestellten dass die Minibar nicht funktioniert und wir mussten zwei Tage warten bis der Kühlschrank ersetzt wurde. Das Essen Hotel ist unter jeder Kritik. Ich habe Spareribs gegessen wobei das Fleisch von den Spareribs gleich hart war wie der Knochen. das Frühstück war eine Katastrophe von auf alles musste man so lange warten der Kaffee war kalt.
Zum Schluss als wir ausgecheckt hatten und gerade in unsere Taxi steigen wollten sind die Leute von der Rezeption gekommen und haben gesagt wir hätten ein Glas kaputt gemacht im Zimmer. Muss aber dazu sagen dass wir das Glas sicherlich nicht kaputt gemacht haben und. Ich habe mich dann leider müssen bereit erklären das Glas zu bezahlen. Für das Glas einfach derart wie ich in jedem kaufhaus für 10.000 IDR kaufen kann hatten die Leute die Frechheit für das Glas über 70.000 rupiah zu verlangen.
Uns wird dieses Hotel nie mehr sehen.
title: Solis Hotel

text:
3 Nächte durften wir hier verbringen. Der Service ist exzellent, das Personal sehr freundlich, zuvorkommend, hilfreich und auch für kleine Spässe zu haben. Essen Sie unbedingt ein Dessert. Diese sind himmlisch, sehr gut bemessene Portionen und einen Augenschmaus. Die Zimmer mit Meersicht sind in angemessner gösse, sehr sauber und hübsch eingerichtet. Ein Balkon muss sein, denn dem Treiben am Abend zuzuschauen ist herrlich amüsant wenn die jungen überall spielen und im Meer baden. Nehmen sie sich die Zeit für einen Sonnenuntergang. Diese sind malerisch schön!
Das Frühstück ist ausgiebig, abwechslungsreich. Es sind kontinentale sowie auch asiatische Speisen in grosser Vielfalt und Anzahl vorhanden. Einfach versuchen, es hat Köstlichkeiten die man einfach einmal versuchen sollte ;-) und gönnen sie sich eine Massage, der Spa ist schön eingerichtet und die Mitarbeiter verstehen ihr Handwerk sehr gut.
title: Schön gemütlich, direkt am Meer und exzellenter Service!
